author: hship
msg: doc:
- Fix up some errors in the Tutorial documentation, including
the broken Inspector images
framework:
- Extend PropertyHelper to describe properties available for an instance
- Enhance the Inspector's Properties view to add the Property Explorer
junit:
- Fix parser test suite (related to CR/LF issues)
- Add master test suite for Tapestry
- Add test suite for PropertyHelper (and related)
- Add junit.properties file to allow JUnit to initialize
- Make use of the <junit> Ant task to run the tests
vlib:
- Fix problem in web.xml deployment descriptor (which broke private assets).
web:
- Update the "What's New" and "FAQ" pages.

author: hship
msg: Removed all references to the Java Build Environment; Tapestry is now built using
Apache's ant tool.
Build Javadoc only from the Tapestry module level (not the individual project level),
and create a single Javadoc tree for the framework, contrib and examples together.
Start updating copyrights to remove Primix, replace with simply Howard Lewis Ship.

author: hship
msg: framework:
- Include the framework version in the Shell's generator meta-tag.
- Make the inspector's restart button start in a new window, not the inspector window
[ #465749 ] invalid state -- HttpSession - restart service

author: hship
msg: framework:
- Change the test used when searching for localized context assets
- Record render page and component page in direct service's context if different
tutorial:
- Change portal add to test #464397
[ #464231 ] Localization broken in Jetty
[ #464397 ] Direct and InsertBlock

author: hship
msg: framework, contrib, tutorial:
